beneficios.b2: Interview and its publication with the CEO or company executives
beneficios.b3: Distribution of institutional/promotional materials at the event
beneficios.b4: Opportunity to project an institutional video before and after the event (maximum 5 minutes) related to the theme discussed
beneficios.b6: Generation of QR Code with your services
beneficios.b7: Institutional logo presence on all documentation presented to the audience
beneficios.b9: Distribution of institutional/promotional materials at the event

speakersBio.angelesBio: Adopt our 9 key points model to transform and expand your company. Define your value proposition, optimize resources, and strengthen customer relationships to ensure sustainable growth and market leadership.
speakersBio.susanaBio: Her motto encapsulates an essential vision: prioritizing employee well-being in the workplace not only benefits individuals but also boosts productivity and profitability for the company.
speakersBio.cesarBio: César Shlain will share key strategies to optimize your existing business, reduce taxes, and ensure effective financing. Seize this opportunity to reinforce your business structure and achieve sustainable growth.
speakersBio.claudiaBio: Discover how the 5 neurosales tips can transform productivity. Learn to apply principles like emotional appeal and storytelling to improve team dynamics and work-life balance, thereby optimizing overall performance.
speakersBio.noeliaBio: Explore how artificial intelligence optimizes processes, reduces costs, and enhances customer acquisition. Learn to implement AI strategies to increase efficiency and competitiveness in your company.

themes.li2: Drive Growth with an Effective Business Model

question.topics: What topics will be covered at the event?
question.register: How can I register for the event?
question.ticket: What does the event ticket include?
question.accreditation: How can I obtain my accreditation on the day of the event?
question.networking: What networking opportunities will be available?
question.sponsor: How can my company become a sponsor of WellBiz Bridge?
question.benefits: What benefits do I get as a sponsor?
question.exhibition: Can we exhibit our products or services during the event?
question.event: How will our sponsorship be promoted before and during the event?
question.exclusiveness: Are there exclusive sponsorship opportunities for any of the activities or sessions?

answer.wbb: It is a gathering for visionary entrepreneurs and professionals looking to make their businesses strong and prosperous in Miami. The Well Biz Bridge focuses on three fundamental pillars:
answer.item1: WELL - Wellbeing: Every entrepreneur and business owner must be increasingly aware that it is essential for our businesses to impact our quality of life positively. All the information available at this event will not only facilitate business but also make the challenge of growth easier.
answer.item2: BIZ - Business: Having clarity on what we need to know and do for our business to be successful is key when entering Miami. Not knowing this leads us to lose money, time, and become disillusioned. The professionals accompanying us at WellBiz Bridge are experts in legal and financial matters, as well as the soft skills required to create and lead teams.
answer.item3: BRIDGE - Networking: We increasingly need strategic alliances among entrepreneurs. It's not just about making ourselves known but also seeing how what is offered can enhance my business. The key lies in the quality of the relationships we build.
answer.public: Ideal for business owners, company members, entrepreneurs, consultants, and coaches interested in business well-being and growth.
answer.topics: We will cover the importance of business vision, translating vision into a business plan, structuring it effectively, and strategies for financing. Additionally, we'll explore the practical applications of artificial intelligence in business operations.
answer.register: You can register through our website, where you will find a registration section. Just complete the form.
answer.ticket: The ticket includes access to all presentations, session materials, networking opportunities, finger food & drinks.
answer.accreditation: Your accreditation will be available at registration on the day of the event. Present your registration confirmation and a valid ID.
answer.networking: There will be thematic tables during cocktail and a dedicated networking space, facilitating the search for partners, suppliers, or clients.
answer.sponsor: For sponsorship opportunities, please contact our sponsorship team via email or phone number provided in the contact section.
answer.benefits: Benefits include brand visibility to a elite leaders in Miami, networking opportunities, participation in panel discussions, and much more. Specific details depend on the sponsorship level.
answer.levels: Yes, we offer various sponsorship levels, each with its own benefits and exposure opportunities. Details are available in our sponsorship package.
answer.exhibition: Yes, depending on the sponsorship level, you may have the opportunity to exhibit your products or services.
answer.event: We will promote our sponsors through our communication channels, including social media, email, and the event website.
answer.exclusiveness: Yes, we offer exclusive sponsorship options for certain sessions and activities. Complete the sponsors form and we will contact you.

form.callToAction2: Register now to receive our newsletter and stay informed about this exciting event!
form.sponsorTitle: Thank you for your interest in sponsoring our event in Miami!
form.sponsorBody: Please complete the following form so we can get to know you better and explore collaboration opportunities. We are excited to work together to make this event a memorable success.

angeles.name: Angeles Lucero Bringas
angeles.slogan: Will you follow the path set or will you be the architect of your own destiny?
angeles.title: Specialist in transformation and sustainability of family businesses.
angeles.theme: How to innovate your business model
angeles.p2: This conference is essential for business leaders, entrepreneurs, and managers seeking a radical transformation of their business approaches to secure a leadership position in the market. Ángeles Lucero Bringas will share her extensive experience and knowledge in creating successful business models, providing essential tools to anticipate and shape the future of your industry.
angeles.bio1: I am María de los Ángeles Lucero Bringas, an expert in economic transformation and sustainability of family businesses. Originally from Córdoba and with studies in Barcelona, I have dedicated my career to management consulting, specializing in strengthening family businesses in Miami. My focus is on innovating and leading with awareness so that these companies not only thrive but also have a positive impact on society and the environment.
angeles.bio2: My mission is to empower family businesses to achieve excellence through sustainable practices and innovative leadership. Inspired by my roots and the rich cultural heritage of my family, I seek to transform the family business sector, ensuring that these entities not only survive but also stand out in a competitive global market. With a deep knowledge in accounting and management consulting, my vision focuses on sustainability and innovation as pillars of a positive and lasting change.

cesar.name: César Shlain
cesar.slogan: Imagine it, we make it possible.
cesar.title: Independent Accounting Professional.
cesar.p1: César will share his extensive experience on how to effectively structure your company to foster growth and secure strategic financing.
cesar.p2: Year after year, we work for the development of the private business sector, supporting investors from small to large, betting on the formation of alliances as a key resource to build the world we all want. Our main objective is to enhance our clients in their process of development and expansion into new markets.
cesar.bio1: With a notable track record in business optimization and financial advice, César is a recognized leader in the field of business economics and strategic planning. His practical approach adapts the best industrial practices to help companies overcome economic challenges and scale efficiently. His ability to integrate economic theories with effective corporate strategies allows organizations not only to face current challenges but also to anticipate future market opportunities.
cesar.bio2: Thanks to his deep knowledge and experience, César has transformed the way companies manage their resources and processes, achieving sustainable and profitable growth. Through his leadership, companies have significantly improved their operational structure and capacity for innovation, ensuring a competitive edge in their respective industries. César is undoubtedly a key figure for any company looking to adapt and thrive in the changing global economic environment.

claudia.name: Claudia Lalloz
claudia.title: Coach specialized in Emotional Intelligence in Organizations.
claudia.p1: Principles of emotionality and storytelling to improve team dynamics.

list.li2: Development of Empathy and Emotional Connection.
list.li5: High-Performance Culture in the Sales Team.

claudia.p2: This conference is crucial for any business leader who seeks not only to improve their sales figures but also to develop a resilient and highly effective sales team. Take this unique opportunity to learn from one of the most renowned experts in the field of neurosales.
claudia.bio1: Claudia Lalloz is an executive, entrepreneur, and Master Organizational Coach with a notable track record in communication processes during business crises. With a double Master's in MCC from ICF and Master Practitioner from EMCC, she is recognized as the fifth Master Coach by EMCC in Spain and has been an international speaker in Latin America and Europe. Her training in Pragmatic Linguistics and over 20,000 hours of Coaching support her ability to enhance the communication skills of teams with precision. Claudia is a leader in Coach Training internationally with locations in Buenos Aires, Miami, and Madrid, and has been the president of the International Coaching Federation in Argentina. She is also the author of books like 'The Being and Doing of Coaching' and 'The Alchemy of Questions,' in addition to hosting a radio program in Spain, Global Coaching and NLP Radio.
claudia.bio2: Listening to Claudia Lalloz at conferences offers business leaders and managers an exceptional opportunity to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of their companies. Her focus on strategic communication and crisis management provides practical tools to address operational challenges and improve the working environment, which can in turn lead to increased productivity and profitability. Claudia's experience in developing communication skills translates into more effective leadership and the creation of more cohesive and resilient teams. Attending her conferences or workshops not only inspires but also equips organizations with advanced strategies to navigate today's complex business world.

noelia.name: Noelia Sánchez
noelia.slogan: Will You Be a Leader or a Follower?
noelia.title: Specialist in Artificial Intelligence.
noelia.p1: How artificial intelligence technology not only optimizes processes and reduces costs, but is also crucial for increasing sales and improving customer acquisition and retention.
noelia.p2: This event is a must-attend opportunity for those who wish to lead in their industry through the adoption and utilization of artificial intelligence, ensuring not just the survival but the flourishing of their business in the digital age.
noelia.bio1: With a background in Social Work and a PhD in Gender Studies, Sociology, and Anthropology, Noelia has led the way toward digital innovation, applying her academic knowledge to technological solutions that address complex problems and improve business profitability. As CEO and co-founder of Empowerit, Noelia has implemented AI strategies that have revolutionized both operations and customer experience across various industries. Her interdisciplinary approach has allowed the company not only to adapt to technological changes but also to lead in the creation of products that are socially responsible and economically viable.
noelia.bio2: Listening to Noelia during this talk will provide a unique insight into how the integration of artificial intelligence can lead to significant improvements in efficiency and profitability. Through her experiences and case studies, participants will learn practical methods to apply AI in a way that reinforces commitment to equity and inclusion while driving economic growth. This approach not only enhances the company's perception among its customers and stakeholders but also sets a model for other businesses looking to thrive in an increasingly digital and socially aware business environment.

susana.name: Susana Benavente
susana.title: Communicator, Passionate Advocate for Entrepreneurial and Independent Women.
susana.p1: Discover the Magic of Connection and Sharing to Improve Organizational Health
susana.p2: Join Susana Benavente in a unique experience where we will explore the wonderful connection between individuals and how it can transform workplaces into positive and healthy environments for everyone. During the talk, participants will gain knowledge, tools, and a new perspective on well-being at work. We will address the fundamental axis of individual health and well-being, and how these aspects influence performance and organizational culture. After years of studying this phenomenon of organizational well-being, we are excited to share our research and discoveries with you.
susana.bio: I have been working in media for 24 years, specifically focused on women's issues, accompanying processes of personal growth and development from that perspective. I am very curious, an avid reader, and a constant learner. I identify with art, space, creativity, flexibility, and color. I love nature, from which I learn every day. Mother of three princesses, who teach me the art of being a mom every day. In my consultancy, I lead personal and commercial projects both in Argentina and Miami.

home.title: WellBiz Bridge | Home
home.description: Join the forefront of business success at the WellBiz Bridge event in Miami this May 24th. Discover how to strengthen your business, enhance your wellbeing, and expand your network all in one place. Featuring panels dedicated to legal, financial, and wellness aspects, WellBiz Bridge is the ultimate gathering for entrepreneurs and professionals seeking to thrive in a constantly changing world. Register now to connect, learn, and grow at the JW Marriott, Miami.
home.keywords: WellBiz Bridge Miami, Miami business event, Networking for entrepreneurs, Workplace wellbeing, Business innovation, Business growth, Leadership and management event, Technology and business, Business strategies 2024, Business health and productivity

speakers.title: WellBiz Bridge | Speaker
speakers.description: Discover the experts and business leaders who will be present at WellBiz Bridge 2024. Meet our speakers who will share their knowledge and experiences in business wellness, business innovation, and effective networking.
speakers.keywords: WellBiz Bridge 2024, Business Speakers Miami, Leadership and Wellness, Networking in Miami, Angeles Lucero Bringas, Empowerit, santalá, chayim group, lalloz

travel-info.title: WellBiz Bridge | Travel & Info
travel-info.description: Explore Miami, a city where natural beauty and shopping opportunities come together to offer a unique experience. Discover the best parks, natural reserves, and shopping centers during your stay.
travel-info.keywords: Miami nature, Miami shopping, Miami parks, Miami shopping centers, shops in Miami, places to visit in Miami, Miami tourism, WellBiz Bridge, networking in Miami, business wellness

schedule.title: WellBiz Bridge | Schedule
schedule.description: This May 24th at the JW Marriott Hotel, Miami, business leaders and experts in organizational well-being and artificial intelligence technology will share strategies and insights. From registration to closing, experience enriching conversations, deep learning, and networking opportunities with cocktails.
schedule.keywords: business event, organizational well-being, artificial intelligence, networking, JW Marriott Miami, Miami entrepreneurs, business technology, business strategies, professional development, networking event

travel.title: Travel & Info
travel.shortIntro: Miami is distinguished not only for its weather and beaches but also as a vibrant hub for corporate events, with over 480 hotels and 64,000 rooms. This city offers an ideal space for business and networking, hosting major conventions and trade fairs. The combination of functionality and recreation in Miami creates a perfect environment for professional connections in an exciting setting.

biscayne-national-park.name: Biscayne National Park Institute
biscayne-national-park.description: Explore and learn at Biscayne National Park with adventures that blend fun and education. Sail, paddle, dive, and discover islands with the Biscayne National Park Institute, a collaboration with the Florida National Parks Association. These experiences not only enrich your knowledge about the nature and history of the park but also support its conservation. Participate in our unique activities and contribute to preserving this national treasure for future generations.

larry-penny-thompson.name: Larry & Penny Thompson Park
larry-penny-thompson.description: Discover the Larry and Penny Thompson Memorial Park and Campground in Miami-Dade, a 270-acre green space perfect for both business and recreation. With 240 campsites for vehicles and a tent area, the park offers modernities like free WiFi and extensive camping facilities. Explore outdoor activities such as swimming, biking, and picnicking, or delve into the history of its namesakes with exhibitions at the campground office.

everglades.name: Everglades National Park
everglades.description: Located at the southern tip of Florida, Everglades National Park is a vast subtropical ecosystem and a World Heritage Site. This 1.5 million-acre park is ideal for combining business with adventure. It offers a variety of activities, from kayaking to boat tours, perfect for team building and networking in a natural environment. Participate in guided tours to explore the rich biodiversity and discuss future projects surrounded by stunning nature, making each professional encounter a memorable and sustainable experience.

crandon-park.name: Crandon Park
crandon-park.description: Crandon Park in Key Biscayne is an ideal getaway from Miami, offering peaceful beaches and outdoor activities. Enjoy natural trails, snorkeling tours, or relax in cabanas after an active day. Athletes can play on the challenging Crandon Golf Course, one of the most beautiful according to Golf Digest, or compete in the 26 tennis courts at the Tennis Center, former home of the PGA Open. Perfect for combining business and recreation in a spectacular natural setting.

saks-fifth.name: Saks Fifth Avenue-Brickell
saks-fifth.description: Saks Fifth Avenue stands out in the world of luxury retail for its impeccable selection of collections from renowned designers, both American and international. More than just a store, it is a fashion destination offering a superior shopping experience each visit, with an exquisite range of handbags, shoes, jewelry, and cosmetics carefully selected. Each customer enjoys exceptional service, courtesy of a team dedicated to providing fashion advice and personalized attention, elevating every purchase to a memorable event.

brickell-city-centre.name: Brickell City Centre
brickell-city-centre.description: Brickell City Centre is an urban luxury sanctuary in Miami, offering three levels of shopping, dining, and entertainment, all anchored by a stunning 107,000 square-foot Saks Fifth Avenue store. This 500,000 square-foot shopping space is distinguished by its vertical design and houses a diversity of luxury brands ranging from premium firms to the latest market newcomers, covering everything from fashion and jewelry to home decor and beauty.

aventura-mall.name: Aventura Mall
aventura-mall.description: Aventura Mall is not just a shopping center, but a vibrant destination for art, fashion, and dining in North Miami. This evolving space offers an impressive selection of over 300 luxury stores, including icons like Hermès, Gucci, and Louis Vuitton, alongside retail giants like Nordstrom and Bloomingdale's. More than shopping, the mall enriches the experience with its art program featuring more than 20 museum-worthy pieces scattered throughout its corridors, including works by Carsten Höller and Robert Indiana.

ocean-drive.name: Collins Avenue/Ocean Drive Shopping District
ocean-drive.description: South Beach, in the heart of Miami Beach, is the epicenter of fashion, art, culture, and entertainment, attracting celebrities and creatives from all walks of life. Ocean Drive, iconic for its vibrant nightlife and art deco architecture, stands out with over 30 designer brands, establishing itself as the forefront of fashion trends in the region. Concurrently, Collins Avenue, known as the 'Cool Capital,' is dotted with boutiques and accessory stores that capture the essence of the latest in fashion. Miami Beach continues to seduce a young and trendy audience with stores like Vans and Free People, while boutique hotels like the renowned Hotel South Beach on Collins Avenue, reinforce its reputation as a key destination for style and sophistication enthusiasts.

schema.register: Beginning of the day. Register and get ready for a day full of learning and new connections.
schema.speakers: Expert conversations. Key strategies to boost your business
schema.cocktail: Closing the event with a relaxed networking session and cocktail.
